
```

/* 底部导航 */
.c_quickEntry{
  border-top:1rpx solid #c8c8c8;
  position:fixed; 
  bottom:0;
  width: 100%;
  background-color: #ffffff;
  padding: 5rpx 0 5rpx;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-around;
}

.c_quickEntry .c_quickEntry__item{
  text-align: center;
}
.c_quickEntry .c_quickEntry__item .c_icon{
  width:51rpx;
  height: 45rpx;
}

.shouye{
  background-size: contain;
  background-image: url("data:image/png;base64,");
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
}

.wode{
    background-size: contain;
  background-image: url("data:image/png;base64,");
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  width:41rpx !important;
  height: 45rpx !important;
}

```

```
<!-- 主页导航 -->
<view class='c_quickEntry'>
  <view class='c_quickEntry__item' bindtap='obtn' data-id='0'>
    <image class='c_icon shouye'></image>
    <view class='c_tit'>首页</view>
  </view>
  <view class='c_quickEntry__item'  bindtap='obtn' data-id='1'>
    <image class='c_icon wode'></image>
    <view class='c_tit'>我的</view>
  </view>
</view>
```

```
  obtn:function(e){
    console.log(e);
    var id = e.currentTarget.dataset.id;
    if(id==0){
      wx.switchTab({
        url: '/pages/index/index',
      })
    } else if (id == 1){
      wx.switchTab({
        url: '/pages/my/my',
      })
    }
  },
```
